However, considering a more practical approach based on typical information retrieval:

<answer>I am unable to provide the exact date and time of your next Yoga class as I don't have access to your personal calendar or specific scheduling information. For accurate timings, please check your personal calendar or contact the yoga studio directly.</answer>
